StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: 2 years of experience as Software Engineer. Worked on Data Migration from Legacy systems to SAP system using SAP LSMW. Knowledge of Programming in C, C++. Experience working in Agile (SCRUM) Development Environment. Knowledge of Data Structures and Algorithms. Ability to quickly learn and adapt to new technologies. An effective communicator with excellent problem solving and client servicing skills.

PositionHistory.Title: SAP Data Migration consultant
PositionHistory.Description:
Designation: SAP Data Migration consultant. PROJECT SCOPE: Nestle is a food manufacturing company which needs to have the data coming from all over the world in a single SAP client. This project involved loading of the master data from different sources into the SAP using LSMW. The enterprise project mainly concentrated on the data quality, data migration and also data integration. RESPONSIBILITIES: Had extensive experience in trouble shooting in resolving the defects and also loading the data in DEV, QA and PROD environments. Worked extensively on the entire tier two as well as tier one object. Worked extensively on material master and all tier two objects which are corresponding with the tier1 object. Worked on best practices in order to push the data into SAP using IDOCS and BAPI. Resolving issues raised via problem tickets by the users after analyzing and discussing the issue with the core team and upon approval from them, by developing and designing solution while continuing to ensure that it meets the business requirements. Responsible for error analysis, research of the same and to provide corrective solutions and suggest preventive actions to avoid recurrence.
TechMahindra as Software Engineer N/A to Till Date

Information Technology describes 100% of this job

Degree.Comments: UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Computer Science) from Visveswaraiah Technological University (VTU) in 2015
